extendedInfo.description: As reviewed and recommended by Droid Nerds and AndroidTapp!School Scheduler is the perfect app to keep track of your courses, lectures and assignments for the school term. Perfect for university and college students, this app allows you to carry around your school schedule and homework info wherever you go!Note: If you are upgrading from the free version, the data should transfer over to the full version automatically on first startup.For Android 2.1 and up.Key Features: * Add courses and store additional optional information such as course webpage, email address, office or notes * Sync your classes and tasks to Google Calendar (Requires Google Calendar application to be installed on the device) * Mark days off or cancel individual courses or classes over a period of time. * Import/Export your schedule to other android devices * Create tasks and classes out of existing Google calendar events * Add classes to a course with one-time/weekly/bi-weekly occurrences * Identify classes for a course by tagging them as a lecture/lab/tutorial/seminar/exam (Full version only) * Add tasks to track upcoming assignments or non-class specific chores * Review upcoming lectures and due assignments using the handy day planner * Choose to display times in both 12-hour and 24-hour formats * Dates and times are displayed in the device's locale. There's no need to learn new formats! * Choose whether you want classes/exams/tasks to sync to calendar (exams only available in full version) * Localized to German and Polish (based on phone language settings) * Tablet layout support  * Now with light and dark themesThis app is still in development but early adopters will save from the final purchase price (expected to be around $2.50 to $3.00)!Note: Internet permission needed for crash reporting.

reviews.title: So far so good!
reviews.comment: Looks awesome and was very easy to add all my info. I will give an update once classes start in August.
reviews.author: Spencer McClendon

reviews.title: I love this scheduler (Samsung S3 and Note 8)
reviews.comment: I reviewed many school schedulers, sat with my college daughter and rated eight applications.  This application is user friendly,  straight forward, efficient, synchronizes with your Google Calendar.  My wife said, why not bypass the scheduler and post to your calendar.  I replied,  you can isolate your school planning and add details at the task tab.  The developer listens to users.  The developer is adding a widget to the application with daily classes and tasks for quick access and visual people.
reviews.author: James Benjamin

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.comment: Syncs to Google calendar!  Very clean simple powerful interface
reviews.author: Cason Adams

reviews.title: Best app out there
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for a good 8 months and love it to bits. It has a great simple UI, very easy to use, and all the features I need.
reviews.author: Yatin Mistry

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Had this for a while but only just using it now semester is starting. Works perfectly; so simple yet very elegant, and I love the Google calendar syncing, so all my classes and tasks show on my home screen calendar widget. Looks great too, although a little bit generic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great developer
reviews.comment: Helped me with a few bug fixes and than added them in an update in less than a week. He wants/tries to improve his app based on his users input.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice elegance work
reviews.comment: It is nice that it can synchronized. I use it to plan lessons and keep track of the taught already subjects It would be nice to see some grading options
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looking good so far
reviews.comment: App looks good so far.  When semester starts I\'ll be able to really test it out. Would like the option to look at an entire weeks schedule of classes as well as the already included daily schedule within the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app, but 1 suggestion...
reviews.comment: Is there a way you could make it so that we could add our own \"class type\" instead of picking one from the list? I have \"recitations\" but have been using \"tutorials\" instead, which isn\'t a huge issue but it would be nice if there were a way to add your own! Otherwise, really nice app all around :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Very solid app. Definitely worth trying.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A real quality app
reviews.comment: This app is a really solid app. All parts of it work well. With most apps there is at least one little thing that\'s annoying but this app doesn\'t. It\'s just a really well made app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great help
reviews.comment: For someone who takes 20+ hours every semester this app helps me keep track of what is due when and what I have what day and so on.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awsome
reviews.comment: Great for keeping track of classes
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustration!
reviews.comment: Can\'t copy paste or duplicate entries. Click task will nothing unclick for changes often just have to erase and start over. Beyond frustrating!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sync between multiple devices
reviews.comment: I like the app and how it syncs with Google calender but I have multiple android devices and wish there was a way to sync them both to each other
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Intuitive and extremely useful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sync problems
reviews.comment: I love the concept of this ap but for some reason when classes sync to my calendar some of them appear on days I don\'t have selected making it useless for what I wanted it for. Huge bummer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good free app
reviews.comment: Pretty good app...use for reminder class days and task feature I use for hmek due and TEST DAYS...  WISH!!! there was a place to keep a record of scores.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like what I\'m seeing
reviews.comment: I still need to wait for my semester to start to fully justify my purchase but I like what I see so far. Plus, its always good to help a fellow redditor!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: This app has a lot of potential. My only issue is that the sync is currently only one-way (adds courses to your calendar, but cannot import courses already in your calendar and won\'t recognize changes made in your calendar). Five stars, hands down, if this can be resolved!
reviews.author: A Google User
